code: import React from'react';import{Link,Navigate}from'react-router-dom';import{connect}from'react-redux';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Landing=_ref=>{let{isAuthenticated}=_ref;if(isAuthenticated){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Navigate,{to:"/dashboard"});}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("section",{className:"landing",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"dark-overlay",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"landing-inner",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"x-large",children:"Developer Connector"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"lead",children:"Create a developer profile/portfolio, share posts and get help from other developers"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"buttons",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/register",className:"btn btn-primary",children:"Sign Up"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/login",className:"btn btn-light",children:"Login"})]})]})})});};const mapStateToProps=state=>({isAuthenticated:state.auth.isAuthenticated});export default connect(mapStateToProps)(Landing);
